data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: John spent a lot of time on the farm, doing things like driving a tractor and repairing combines. The ____ used ____ have a ____ of ____ machinery ____ John to ____. Since John ____ working ____ the ____, equipment ____ has ____ improved. Now John ____ state-of-the-art equipment ____ doesn't require ____ to ____ with ____ blades ____ awkward ____. He also doesn't have to help repair or replace machines as much because the equipment is now so well designed and the manufacturers put a lot of effort into making the machinery durable.

He also doesn't have to help repair or replace machines as much because the equipment is now so well designed and the manufacturers put a lot of effort into making the machinery durable.
data.answer: 约翰花了很多时间在农场上，做一些像开拖拉机和修理联合收割机之类的事情。这个农场过去有很多危险的机器让约翰操作。自从约翰开始在农场工作以来，设备的安全性大大提高了。现在约翰使用最先进的设备，不需要用锋利的刀片处理尴尬的内容。他也不需要帮忙修理或更换机器，因为设备现在设计得很好，制造商花了很多精力使机器耐用。
